description:
Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix!  If Jonouchi can’t withstand the inferno flames of the Phoenix’s blazing fire, he’ll be burned to a crisp and lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Retour au royaume des ombres - 4e partie
